```{ojs}
//| label: setup

r = require.alias({
  maplibregl: "maplibre-gl@2.1.9/dist/maplibre-gl.js",
  h3: {},
  deck: "deck.gl@8.9.35/dist.min.js"
});

maplibregl = r("maplibregl").catch(() => window["maplibregl"]);
deck = r("deck");
```

```{ojs}
//| label: load-data

centroids = FileAttachment("/data/nuclear-commodity-centroids.csv")
  .csv({ typed: true })
allData = FileAttachment("/data/nuclear-commodity-data.csv")
  .csv({ typed: true })
```
